On 14 Feb 2007, at 15:56, Elliotte Harold wrote:
> Do we really want to trust these folks to define the official Java  
> spec
> for REST? Please read the JSR, and send comments to jsr-311- 
> comments@...
You know, I think I trust Marc et all to come up with
something worthwhile and put it in the hands of a
lot of developers.

What worries me most about REST is that it isn't testable.
What allows you to say this site is "powered by REST"
beyond passing the sniff of a bunch of self-appointed
critics on this list.

In this respect it's really no better than SOA.

This kind of Email is one of the reasons why I tend to
avoid using the R-word.

Pirates. "Style". Pthrupt!

Paul
